# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
SSC BPM021288 - AMD EPYC 7003 Series - 2U GPU Gen4 Server for the NRCC: Amendment 1

## Brief Overview
Shared Services Canada (SSC) seeks to acquire AMD EPYC 7003 Series - 2U GPU Gen4 Server hardware or equivalent for the National Research Council of Canada (NRCC). The required hardware will be delivered to a location in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador.

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-24-00026299:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM021288/26299
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-15
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-26T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-04-22

## Requirement
A bid must comply with all requirements outlined in the solicitation documents to be considered responsive. The-responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Bid Submission Requirements
Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the contracting authority's email. Faxed and hardcopy (submitted in person or via mail/courier) bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

## Supporting Documents
Bidder must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A - List of Deliverables and Pricing. For complete details regarding this requirement, including the mandatory criteria, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection, please refer to the Request for Quotations document.

## Language and Language of Communication
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
